results.title: For science and the arts
results.brief_description: A rare distinction for outstanding achievements in science or art is selection to the exclusive German Order “Pour le Merite”, limited to 30 German and 30 foreign artists and scientists. Shows distinguished members and outstanding scientific and artistic achievements of the 19th and 20th centuries. In English and German language.

results.title: For love or money
results.creator_credit: Stephen Ramsey, Robin Hughes and Film Australia
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Working series”.
One of a series of films about attitudes to work. Deals with the satisfaction one feels when working for yourself, doing something you really enjoy, even if the money is not as much as working for an employer. A commercial artist, sign-writer and a mechanic present their viewpoints.

results.title: For gentlemen only
results.creator_credit: Michael Scott, Roman Kroitor, Vladmir Valenta and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: The story of two retired old men whose comfortable world is threatened when their hotel, formerly for gentlemen only, decides to admit women. The film shows how they react to and cope with this change. (Award: Toronto)

results.title: 'For better, for worse'
results.brief_description: Taking an average viewer as its hero this cartoon demonstrates satirically how television can be a pleasure and a source of information or, if taken in too large a dose, can mesmerize and engulf the viewer. It contains some inventive gags, lively animation and genial humour.

results.title: Football
results.brief_description: Football (soccer) is a major sport and social phenomenon in Britain, where the game was born. Amateur players are the backbone of the sport, about half a million of them in England alone, mostly young and many belonging to England’s 30,000 amateur clubs. The film explains the history, the competition leading up to the Cup Final and how football is now a world sport including the Chinese, Nigerians and Argentinians who come and play well-known teams in Britain.

results.title: Food technology
results.creator_credit: Career Productions and Mutual Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A vocational guidance film showing scientists involved in food preparation and storage, and research into development of new processes and packaging methods. Discusses opportunities for the food technologist.
